scripts.fulldoc:win32: yarn run doc && yarn run fixdocs && yarn run format
scripts.fulldoc:default: yarn run doc && yarn run fixdocs && yarn run format
scripts.prettier: prettier --write docs/**/*.js docs/**/*.html docs/**/*.css **/*.md Path/**/*.java RobotLibrary/**/*.java Vision/**/*.java
scripts.fixdocs: nodedos2unix docs/**/COPYRIGHT docs/**/LICENSE docs/**/element-list docs/**/*.html docs/**/*.js docs/**/*.css
